title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares an unfortunate reality facing the Cowboys as they lose their star LT Tyron Smith and why their offseason has gone from bad to worse. He gives kudos to the Lakers for acquiring Patrick Beverly in a trade and what this says about their relationship with Russell Westbrook right now. He also explains why Bill Belichick no longer seems to be following the "Patriot Way". Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to tell Colin if it looks like Kenny Pickett should be the Steelers starting QB based on his preseason tape. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
